name: Stay At Home
description:
This game is a cute kitten reflex click game☆
You can see the content singly by clicking.
When an enemy appears, please click on the enemy in a hurry.
If you don't click quickly, the enemy will run away.
Can kittens protect their homes?

There are no levels or ranks.
There is one ending.

When a game is cleared, a special mode comes out.
It's also most suitable for practice of the child's small mouse.
